organic.title: Special Needs Shelters | Florida Department of Health
organic.snippet: We administer statewide Special Needs Shelters to assist local communities in meeting the needs of special medical and vulnerable populations.

organic.title: Find An Open Shelter and Other Services - American Red Cross
organic.snippet: If you are in immediate need of shelter during a disaster, use our shelter map to locate your nearest options or contact your local Red Cross chapter.

organic.title: SPECIAL NEEDS SHELTER | Fort Pierce, FL - Official Website
organic.snippet: A Special Needs Shelter is available for individuals whose capabilities require assistance in the management of their illness, ailment, or injury.

organic.snippet: Special Needs Shelters provide a level of medical care beyond basic first aid to maintain the health status of persons who are medically stable and do not ...

organic.title: Special Needs Registry: Home Page
organic.snippet: A registry for persons with special needs to register with their local emergency management agency to receive assistance during a disaster.
